title: provenance
description: String or an object with keys describing the origin of the data i.e. institution, address, personell etc. Object has values as a number or a string.

organization.title: organization
organization.description: Name of the company, organization, institution, university etc. that produced the dataset recorded within the file.

location.title: location
location.description: Object that specifies physical location or address of organization that provided dataset recorded within the file.

country.title: organization
country.description: Name of the country where organization is located

county.title: organization
county.description: Name of the county within country where organization is located

city.title: organization
city.description: Name of the city where organization is located

street.title: organization
street.description: Name of the street within city where organization is located

building_nr.title: organization
building_nr.description: Street number of the building where organization is residing

room_nr.title: organization
room_nr.description: Laboratory or the room number within the organization's building

coordinates.title: organization
coordinates.description: Organization location coordinates according to ISO 6709 standard

website.title: website
website.description: Url of the organization/institution's web-page if available.

email.title: email
email.description: Contact email of organization or its contact person. According to RFC 5321, section 4.1.2

phone.title: phone
phone.description: Contact phone/mobile number of organization or its contact person according to notation for international numbers suggested by ITU E.123 standard.

contact_person.title: contact_person
contact_person.description: Name of the contact person representing the organization.

comments.title: comments
comments.description: Any additional iformation related to the provenance of the presented data in text form.
